BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 160159Z NOV BY
   M/V NPS OCEANIC ENDEAVOUR TOWING 12
   FIVE LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   25-53.53S 040-57.45W, 24-12.95S 041-55.82W,
   21-54.33S 038-31.52W, 24-04.92S 037-16.62W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 160259Z NOV 13.
